et: Middle English {it}nominatyf{/it}, from Anglo-French or Latin; Anglo-French {it}nominatif{/it}, from Latin ({it}casus{/it}) {it}nominativus{/it} nominative case, from {it}nominare{/it}; from the traditional use of the nominative form in naming a noun
